DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of procedural differences during the Valsalva maneuver and deep breathing test in autonomic nervous system testing.
DOC.brief_title: Autonomic Responses During the Valsalva Maneuver and Deep Breathing Test Depend on the Experimental Setup
DOC.criteria: male â‰¥ 18 year normal ECG12 any known disease smoking any intake of regular medicine
